body.name: Queen Bed Frame with RGB Lights, 4 Drawers, Headboard and Fast Charger - Rustic Brown, Easy Assembly with Storage, No Box Spring Needed
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 1 min
features: Enhanced Comfort with Ergonomic Headboard and RGB Lights - Experience the ultimate relaxation with our queen-size bed frame featuring a 95-degree tilted headboard and integrated RGB lights. Designed to perfectly contour to your back's natural curve, this ergonomic headboard provides optimal support and comfort as you unwind. With 20 vibrant colors, 8 brightness levels, and 20 changing modes, you can effortlessly create captivating atmospheres for any occasion.

Convenient Storage Solution with 4 Practical Drawers - Say goodbye to clutter and embrace a tidy bedroom. Our queen bed frame with storage is equipped with four spacious under-bed storage drawers on wheels. Ideal for organizing off-season clothes, quilts, and smaller items, these drawers ensure your belongings are neatly stored away. We also provide 4 matching drawer liners to prevent snags and keep everything in place, safeguarding your possessions

Functional Headboard with Fast Charger and Storage Shelves - Stay connected and organized effortlessly. The headboard of our bed frame queen size features built-in 2 * USB C chargers and 1 * 125V/12A DC outlet, allowing you to charge your devices conveniently from the comfort of your bed. Additionally, the 3-tier storage shelves provide ample space for books, decorations, a clock, or personal items, ensuring everything you need is within reach.

Effortless Assembly and Thoughtful Design - Experience hassle-free setup with our unique quick-lock design and clearly labeled parts. Within just 60 minutes, you'll have your bed frame ready for use. We've also thoughtfully reserved space for a nightstand at the head, ensuring convenient access to items stored in the under-bed drawers.

Noise-Free and Sturdy Construction - Enjoy a peaceful sleep experience. The embedded design ensures that your mattress stays firmly in place without sliding. The curved bed feet are designed to avoid foot collisions. Constructed with heavy-duty steel and accented with rustic brown wood, our metal bed frame can bear up to 1500 pounds while adding a stylish touch to your room. Queen Size Bed Frame Dimensions: L*W*H: 87.2” x 60.5” x 38.2” (Suitable for 80” x 60” Mattress)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LINSY Bed Frame with Headboard & LED Lights & 4 Drawers
Tips - the mini controller of the RGB LED lights is in the end of the light strip, which is NOT a remote, so you don't have to worry about losing it and able to control the light strip at any time.
Previous page Next page 1 Curved Bed Feet 2 Fast Assembly 3 Noise-Free 4 Away from Slidding

Does this ship in one box? Yes, ONLY one box. Does the LED strip of this bed frame is RGB and can adjust the colors? Yes, the LED strip is RGB lights which have 20 static mode, 20 changing mode and 8 level brightness, you can DIY for your needs. And the controller is in the power cable ( not a remote control). What are the dimensions of storage drawers? The dimension of the bigger drawer is 40.31"x 19.76" x 9.33", the smaller one is 29.31" x 19.76" x 9.33". And the wheels on the drawers would definitely work on carpet. What kind of mattress does it fit? It can fit in all kinds of mattresses with thicknesses between 6-12 inches and does not need a box spring. Is the bed frame easy to assebly? Of course ! All the parts are clearly numbered, with the patented quick locking system, you can assemly it within 1 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as described!!!
reviews.reviewText: For the price of this bed (less than $300), I wasn’t expecting it to be very sturdy or strong. I was pleasantly surprised. It is extremely durable. It’s heavy and sturdy. I weigh 300 lbs and my husband is 150 lbs. I can move around without worrying about bending or breaking it. The outer box was damaged, but nothing inside was. Everything was in the box. It was packed extremely well and efficiently. It went together without a hitch. The instructions were simple and straightforward. My husband and I had no problems putting it together. Make sure you pay attention to the measurements. My husband and I are both 5’2” So the size of this bed is perfect for us. When I’m standing next to the headboard, the top comes to about my elbow. It is a short bed, but it’s perfect for us. The drawers are spacious. We love this bed. 🩷🩷🩷🩷

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprised at the build quality
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for our guest room and was looking for something inexpensive. This is a pretty awesome product for the price. It came packed amazingly well. It is powder coated steel and reasonably heavy steel. I did not know what 'greige' was but it is essentially grey with some brown wood highlights. Attractive.PRO: well made and certainly good for a guest room. Attractive and has storage. Well packaged so little chance of getting a damaged product.CON: It has a ton of screws and took a long time to assemble. Each drawer has 10 screws for example. Although I never need help in assembling anything, this was a challenge for one person. The backboard cannot be easily laid down to assemble the parts and I ended up having to reglue the screw inserts. That said, I am happy with the product even thought it took 3 times longer than expected. The instructions are all pictures ... But I had little issues. OH, the is one unused screw insert on back of each drawer and it appears to be that if you put a screw in it as recommended, it will punch thru the drawer. Cannot see a use for it but thought I would mention it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Assembly simple to follow
reviews.reviewText: The box was HEAVY!! We followed directions and assembled- my son aged 10 and I worked for over 2 hours and only had 1 hiccup which was easily fixable. The bed itself seems sturdy- the only issue we have is the top is not flush as the metal is not low enough… tolerable annoyance… I have a feeling due to this the back wood piece won’t stay as the corners are all that is holding it in-

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome engineering, great value
reviews.reviewText: Takes some time to assemble, but directions are excellent. Really sturdy and an amazing value for all that you get. It is so impressive that this was so well thought out and everything goes together very nicely. Only one item had an issue and that was the holes for the outlet screws were slightly off. No big deal. Got them in fine.Everything seems extremely well engineered. The wheels even slide into captive brackets and are very secure with only one screw.Only thing I wish it had was an adapter for the LED lights to plug into the wall rather than the outlet on the bed. It leaves the wire exposed and is ugly, but that is an easy fix to get a usb adapter.Spacious bins that secure and line up perfectly.Overall amazing value, we'll see how it holds up as a guest bed, but I don't foresee any issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I’m very happy with this purchase
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Although this arrived 5 days later than it was expected, it arrived fully boxed and protected, it was a very organized box with clear instructions and the hardware was very nicely packed-I really really appreciate that. Although the directions don’t have words, the pictures are very clear to understand and it was very easy to put together. I also appreciated the quality-the housing for the screws was metal, so I expect this to last quite a while and not just crumble under me one day. I expect it to last through a move, too. It’s quiet, it doesn’t freak or anything. I got the drawers under mine for storage, they fit nicely and secure. For $400 I think is a good buy. It sits lower to the ground, but I don’t mind that. It looks nice. The reason I gave it three stars is solely because I cannot get the LED strip to work on command. I got it to work the first night I got it put together and haven’t been able to get it to turn on since. I’m bummed because that was a major selling point for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy bed frame
reviews.reviewText: Bed frame is quiet and very sturdy. Easy to assemble when following step by step instructions. Took about an hour with me and my husband. Great for a starter home, kids room or guest room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy(ish) to assemble. Great for small rooms

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent enough for my needs
reviews.reviewText: It was simple to assemble, came with everything needed to assemble, including a cute little hammer, and had extra plastic pieces for holding the slats in place. It absolutely does not squeak or move on carpeting, but might move on hard surfaces. The mattress does tend to sink into the outside slats, something that could be remedied with a thin piece of cardboard or a heavy dust ruffle, and the corners do extend beyond the edge of the mattress but I haven't run into it. There is plenty of storage underneath. I recommend it. For reference, we are medium weight people and use it 5 nights a week.
